metadata.description: Apache Software Foundation projects with CLI tools

apache_cli_tools.name: Kafka
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed event streaming platform for high-performance data pipelines and real-time applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: Spark
apache_cli_tools.description: Spark is a unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.

apache_cli_tools.name: Hadoop
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed computing framework for processing large datasets across clusters using MapReduce and HDFS.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Large image (~1GB compressed). Help command works but may timeout during initial image download.

apache_cli_tools.name: Flink
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Flink is an open source stream processing framework with powerful stream- and batch-processing capabilities.

apache_cli_tools.name: Hive
apache_cli_tools.description: Data warehouse software that facilitates reading, writing, and managing large datasets in distributed storage using SQL.

apache_cli_tools.name: Cassandra
apache_cli_tools.description: Highly-scalable partitioned row store NoSQL database for distributed data management.

apache_cli_tools.name: Accumulo
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Accumulo is a sorted, distributed key/value store that provides robust, scalable data storage and retrieval.

apache_cli_tools.name: Couchdb
apache_cli_tools.description: Multi-master sync NoSQL database with HTTP/JSON API for reliability and ease of use.

apache_cli_tools.name: Httpd
apache_cli_tools.description: Open-source web server providing secure, efficient, and extensible HTTP services.

apache_cli_tools.name: Tomcat
apache_cli_tools.description: Implementation of Jakarta Servlet, Server Pages, Expression Language and WebSocket technologies.

apache_cli_tools.name: Maven
apache_cli_tools.description: Software project management and comprehension tool for Java applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ant
apache_cli_tools.description: Java-based build tool with cross-platform portability for automated builds.

apache_cli_tools.name: Gradle
apache_cli_tools.description: Build automation tool with flexibility and performance for Java, Kotlin, Groovy, Scala, C/C++, and more.

apache_cli_tools.name: Skywalking
apache_cli_tools.description: SkyWalking is an open-source APM system that provides monitoring, tracing and diagnosing capabilities for distributed systems in Cloud Native architectures.

apache_cli_tools.name: Zookeeper
apache_cli_tools.description: Centralized service for configuration, naming, distributed synchronization, and group services.

apache_cli_tools.name: Activemq
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance message broker supporting multiple protocols and messaging patterns.

apache_cli_tools.name: Pulsar
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed pub-sub messaging platform with flexible messaging model and intuitive client API.

apache_cli_tools.name: Rocketmq
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed messaging and streaming platform with low latency and high performance.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ozone
apache_cli_tools.description: Scalable, redundant, and distributed object store for Hadoop and cloud-native environments.

apache_cli_tools.name: Bookkeeper
apache_cli_tools.description: Scalable, fault-tolerant, low-latency storage service optimized for append-only workloads.

apache_cli_tools.name: Beam
apache_cli_tools.description: Unified model for defining batch and streaming data-parallel processing pipelines.

apache_cli_tools.name: Storm
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed realtime computation system for stream processing.

apache_cli_tools.name: Samza
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed stream processing framework for real-time data processing.

apache_cli_tools.name: Airflow
apache_cli_tools.description: Workflow orchestration platform for programmatically authoring, scheduling, and monitoring data pipelines.

apache_cli_tools.name: Oozie
apache_cli_tools.description: Workflow scheduler for managing Hadoop jobs and dependencies.

apache_cli_tools.name: Solr
apache_cli_tools.description: Blazing-fast, open-source, multi-modal search platform built on Apache Lucene.

apache_cli_tools.name: Lucene
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance, full-featured text search engine library written in Java.

apache_cli_tools.name: Arrow
apache_cli_tools.description: Universal columnar format and multi-language toolbox for fast data interchange and in-memory analytics.

apache_cli_tools.name: Thrift
apache_cli_tools.description: Lightweight, language-independent software stack for point-to-point RPC implementation.

apache_cli_tools.name: Avro
apache_cli_tools.description: Data serialization system with rich data structures, compact binary format, and schema evolution support.

apache_cli_tools.name: Parquet
apache_cli_tools.description: Columnar storage format specification for efficient data processing.

apache_cli_tools.name: Druid
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance real-time analytics database for fast aggregations and queries.

apache_cli_tools.name: NiFi
apache_cli_tools.description: Easy-to-use, powerful, and reliable system for processing and distributing data.

apache_cli_tools.name: Superset
apache_cli_tools.description: Modern data exploration and visualization platform for enterprise business intelligence.

apache_cli_tools.name: Zeppelin
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based notebook for interactive data analytics with multi-language support and visualization.

apache_cli_tools.name: Pinot
apache_cli_tools.description: Real-time distributed OLAP datastore for scalable analytics with low latency.

apache_cli_tools.name: IoTDB
apache_cli_tools.description: Time-series database for IoT with high-throughput data collection, storage, and analysis.

apache_cli_tools.name: DolphinScheduler
apache_cli_tools.description: Modern data orchestration platform for agile, low-code development of high-performance workflows.

apache_cli_tools.name: Doris
apache_cli_tools.description: Easy-to-use, high-performance real-time analytical database based on MPP architecture.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Multiple images: fe (Frontend), be (Backend), ms (Meta Service), broker

apache_cli_tools.name: Drill
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed MPP query layer supporting SQL and alternative query languages against NoSQL and Hadoop systems.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kyuubi
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed and multi-tenant gateway for serverless SQL on data warehouses and lakehouses.

apache_cli_tools.name: APISIX
apache_cli_tools.description: Dynamic, real-time, high-performance API Gateway.

apache_cli_tools.name: ShenYu
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance API Gateway for microservices with plugin-based architecture.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Also available: apache/shenyu-admin for admin console

apache_cli_tools.name: ShardingSphere
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed SQL transaction and query engine for data sharding, scaling, and encryption.

apache_cli_tools.name: Camel
apache_cli_tools.description: Open-source integration framework based on Enterprise Integration Patterns with powerful Bean Integration.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Camel K is the Kubernetes-native runtime for Camel

apache_cli_tools.name: EventMesh
apache_cli_tools.description: Serverless event middleware for building distributed event-driven applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: SeaTunnel
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance distributed data integration platform for synchronization and transformation.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ranger
apache_cli_tools.description: Framework for enabling, monitoring and managing comprehensive data security across Hadoop platform.

apache_cli_tools.name: SkyWalking
apache_cli_tools.description: APM system for monitoring, tracing and diagnosing distributed systems in cloud-native architectures.

apache_cli_tools.name: Dubbo-Admin
apache_cli_tools.description: Administration console for Apache Dubbo microservice framework.

apache_cli_tools.name: RocketMQ-Dashboard
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based administration console for Apache RocketMQ message queuing system.

apache_cli_tools.name: APISIX-Dashboard
apache_cli_tools.description: Dashboard UI for Apache APISIX API Gateway management.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kudu
apache_cli_tools.description: Columnar storage manager for structured data with fast analytics on rapidly changing data.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kylin
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed analytics engine providing SQL interface and OLAP analysis on Hadoop for large datasets.

apache_cli_tools.name: HBase
apache_cli_tools.description: NoSQL distributed database built on Hadoop for random, real-time read/write access to big data.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Using community-maintained image (official Apache image not available on Docker Hub)

apache_cli_tools.name: IoTDB-Web-Workbench
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based workbench for Apache IoTDB with data visualization and query management.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Separate frontend and backend images available
